author: Miami Valley Today
title: Ground News - OSP investigates Clark Co. fatal crash - Miami Valley Today
text:
Summary by Miami Valley Today SPRINGFIELD TOWNSHIP — The Springfield Post of the Ohio state Highway Patrol is investigating a fatal crash involving two vehicles in Springfield Township, Clark County. The crash occurred on West National Road at New Carlisle Pike at 2:18 p.m. on Tuesday, Dec. 26. The preliminary investigation revealed that a 1988 Ford Ranger, operated by Noel Joshua Richards, age 39, of Urbana was traveling westbound on West National Road.
